workflow.editor.editor_auto_create_servi: The system will automatically create a custom service entity based on the workflow name. You can view this entity in the custom entity list.
workflow.editor.helper_text_set_content_: Please set Content-Type in the Header
workflow.editor.node_delete_confirm_desc: Are you sure you want to delete this node?
workflow.editor.output_desc_request_para: Query params carried in the request
workflow.editor.save_warning_message: The current workflow has been referenced. Saving will update the workflow information synchronously. Are you sure you want to save it?
workflow.label.abnormal_edge_tip: Node nesting error, please check and retry.
workflow.label.cycle_connection_tip: The connection between the nodes is invalid.
workflow.label.entry_node_number_limit_t: The workflow must have exactly {1} entry node and no more
workflow.label.free_node_limit_tip: No stray nodes allowed in the workflow
workflow.label.httpin_node_desc: Listen for incoming HTTP requests to trigger a running workflow.
workflow.label.listener_node_desc: Trigger the workflow to run whenever any listened entity's value changes.
workflow.label.mqtt_node_desc: Listen for incoming MQTT messages to trigger a running workflow.
workflow.label.node_min_number_limit_tip: The workflow must contain at least {1} node.
workflow.label.placeholder_please_enter_: Please enter the cURL command here.
workflow.label.timer_node_desc: Trigger a workflow run at regular intervals or periodically.
workflow.label.trigger_node_desc: The running of the workflow is triggered manually by the user.
workflow.message.batch_select_by_tags_ti: Modifying tags will synchronize the selected tags.
workflow.message.delete_tip: Are you sure you want to delete the workflow? It cannot be restore after deletion.
workflow.message.import_dsl_error: The DSL file contains errors. Please update the file and try again.
workflow.modal.entry_node_create_title: What type of starting node do you want to create?
workflow.modal.upload_tips: Click here or drag files to this area to upload
workflow.node.service_helper_text: Please select the service you want to request first.
workflow.tip.blueprint_workflow_come_fro: This workflow is generated by the device blueprint.
workflow.valid.edge_id_duplicated: The edge (connecting node {1} and {2}) ID is duplicated.
workflow.valid.invalid_edge_id: The edge (connecting node {1} and {2}) ID is invalid.
workflow.valid.invalid_edge_type: The edge (connecting node {1} and {2}) type is invalid.
workflow.valid.invalid_email: The {1} field value is not a valid email.
workflow.valid.invalid_reference_param: The reference param of {1} field is invalid.
workflow.valid.invalid_timer_interval: The timer interval must be greater than or equal to {1} and less than {2}.
workflow.valid.invalid_url: The {1} field value is not a valid URL.
workflow.valid.invalid_url_path: The {1} field must start with /, supporting alphanumeric and {2} formats.
workflow.valid.max_length: The {1} field length of the value you entered cannot exceed {2} digits.
workflow.valid.max_value: The value assigned to entity {1} shall be less than or equal to {2}.
workflow.valid.min_length: The length of the value assigned to entity {1} cannot be less than {2} bits.
workflow.valid.min_value: The value assigned to entity {1} shall be greater than or equal to {2}.
workflow.valid.output_node_limit_count_t: Only one output node is allowed in a workflow.
workflow.valid.output_node_limit_has_tri: When a workflow contains output nodes, the start node must be a trigger node.
workflow.valid.range_length: The length of the {1} field value should be greater than or equal to {2} and less than or equal to {3}.
workflow.valid.range_num: The value assigned to entity {1} shall be greater than or equal to {2} and less than or equal to {3}.
